title: Summoner names are not showing up in my lobby.
body:
Hi, 

ever since pre-season started, whenever I get into a lobby for ranked I don't see the following lines XXXX has joined the lobby. I would like to know how do I get that back since I use op.gg in champion select, I use a MAC client if that helps.

https://imgur.com/QTvfmtp

This is what I'm talking about.

replies.body:
https://imgur.com/a/eU4RyEM

I get this with my chat, everyone's name is just a bunch of letters and numbers

mine has grey names like the lobby's empty or I keep getting spammed, 'You need a password to join this room.' But I'm already in it. Aram trolls are acting up again, they're just leaving at start in pairs or actual teams of them not ending on purpose by retreating from winnable team fights 5-7 times (e.g 5vs3 near enemy nexus). Report bad lazy xp farming bots that feed if you find them too -.- https://i.ibb.co/tLTys5R/what.png
